## Description

Please include a summary of the documentation change. If this fixes an issue, please link it below.

Fixes # (issue)

## Type of change

Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] Typo or grammar fix
- [ ] Clarification of existing documentation
- [ ] New documentation page or section
- [ ] Update to reflect product changes
- [ ] Structural reorganization

## Checklist

- [ ] I have verified the build passes locally (`npm run build`)
- [ ] I have checked all links are valid
- [ ] I have followed the [writing guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I have previewed the changes locally (`npm run dev`)
